page.title: 10Moving House
page.content: On June the 17th we moved to Tetsworth from Abingdon. We all got up early and Dad wasn't very pleased. I had to make some tea for the removal men. My friend's mum gave us a lolly. I helped the men remove some things. I had a sandwich with my brothers and then I took them to the park and bought them some sweets. When the van was full we all said goodbye and I cried. We drove off. We went on the motorway. When we arrived my dad dropped a hammer on his toe and we all laughed. I met Alex and she showed me the Green. I went to the shop with my brother and we bought some sweets. Our road is narrow and the removal van got stuck turning round. I tripped over a bump in our new garden , I didn't know the bump was there. I liked it best in Abingdon.
